programme.title: Silk Way Rally - Russland/Mongolei/China
programme.desc: The Silk Way Rally is a unique rally because everyone on the Silk Road is equal. Passion and enthusiasm unite people of different origins, nationalities, ethnicities and economic backgrounds.

programme.title: Monster Energy Supercross Geneva
programme.desc: The Monster Energy Supercross Geneva, a must-attend event at the end of the year, brings together several international riders on one of the largest indoor tracks in Europe. As a major sporting event in Switzerland, it has welcomed around 30,000 spectators in almost 35 editions.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 1
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the world's best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Climb
programme.desc: Triathlete Neil Myers was nearly killed in a horrific training accident on Gibraltar Road in 2018. One year later he an his team won the 2019 Santa Barbara Triathlon.

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2017 - Chamonix (FRA) replacement show staged in Andorra
programme.desc: Steep powder slopes, spectacular off-piste runs, and awe-inspiring drops from huge cliffs: since 2008, the world’s leading freeride skiers and snowboarders have fought for the World Championship titles of the Freeride World Tour (FWT) every year.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2017 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Steep powder slopes, spectacular off-piste runs, and awe-inspiring drops from huge cliffs: since 2008, the world’s leading freeride skiers and snowboarders have fought for the World Championship titles of the Freeride World Tour (FWT) every year.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2017 - Haines/Alaska (USA)
programme.desc: Steep powder slopes, spectacular off-piste runs, and awe-inspiring drops from huge cliffs: since 2008, the world’s leading freeride skiers and snowboarders have fought for the World Championship titles of the Freeride World Tour (FWT) every year.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #2 Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Freeride World Tour 2020 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The second stage of the tour will revisit champagne powder paradise Kicking Horse near Golden, British Columbia (CAN).

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #02
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #03
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: For this route from Ruhpolding (GER) to Kasern (ITA), 210 kilometers and more than 10000 meters of vert, recreational athletes need approximately five to seven days. Benedikt Boehm is aiming for the magic time limit of 36 hours, non-stop.

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: The Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc© - Edition 2018171 kilometers - 10,000 meters ascent - 2,300 runnersFor the 2018 UTMB© Damian Hall is ranked 50th by the International Trail Running Association© (ITRA© ).

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Swissway to Heaven
programme.desc: Swissway to Heaven is a film about multi-pitch climbing in the swiss alps.The dokumentary portraits the history and evolution of climbing in Swizerland aswell as Cedric Lachat's adventure climbing all 5 big walls of the swiss alps.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup & GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.title: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2020 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - 25 Years Xtreme Verbier - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier Xtreme gave birth to the Freeride World Tour, the Freeride World Qualifiers and the Freeride Junior Tour and sparked an international wave of competitive freeriding.

programme.title: The legend of Muksu river - Tajikistan
programme.desc: This is a journey to the Silk Road in Central Asia into the adventurous world of canoeing. The Muksu in Tajikistan is one of the three most difficult rapids here. Once immersed in the river, there is no turning back.

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Robbie Maddison
programme.desc: Robbie Maddison began his career competing in national motocross competitions. On New Year's Eve 2007, the 40th anniversary of Evel Knievel's legendary jump over the Caesar's Palace fountain, the Australian broke the world record in the bicycle long jump with his bicycle

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: Perspectives
programme.desc: In Perspectives we take a look at a little-known young French surfer, Sacha Fellous and his daring attempt to surf the legendary Nazaré spot by paddling. At 18 Sacha is an all-round young athlete, a marine explorer cradled by the exceptional setting of the Basque coast.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: Climb
programme.desc: Triathlete Neil Myers was nearly killed in a horrific training accident on Gibraltar Road in 2018. One year later he an his team won the 2019 Santa Barbara Triathlon.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship
programme.desc: This week we follow the worlds boldest Downhill-Skaters, racing down the turkish Mountinroads of Erincan. Be prepared for some narly turns on four wheels!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Marlon "Magic" Moraes: Best of WSOF
programme.desc: Catch up on every one of Marlon Moraes' WSOF fights from 2012 through 2016. Moraes returns to MMA for a showcase bout at the 2022 PFL World Championship on Nov. 25, 2022.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A five-round heavyweight title eliminator between the number one ranked contender Levi Rigters (18-2, 8 KO) and ‘The Golden Wolf’ Bahram Rajabzadeh (69-3, 61 KO). The winner will face ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven (64-10, 21 KO) on December 7 in the main event of COLLISION 7. In the co-main event of the evening, Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-4-1, 13 KO) clashes with Nico ‘Big Sexy’ Horta (23-9, 3 KO) in a monster heavyweight clash with big implication for the rankings. Croatian kickboxing legend Mladen Brestovac (55-14-1, 37 KO) will make his final walk to the ring in his hometown of Zagreb. ‘The Scorpion Sting’ will take on newcomer Karim Dian (16-13, 3 KO) to cap off an illustrious...

GLORY featherweight champion Petch (170-40-3, 27 KO) goes up against former RISE champion Taiju Shiratori (30-10-1, 12 KO), the in-form Berjan Peposhi (30-4, 16 KO) takes on ‘The Korean Monster’ Sunghyun Lee (69-11-2, 17 KO), the always exciting Abraham Vidales (16-3, 13 KO) collides with current RISE champ Chadd Collins (63-17-2, 32 KO), and number one ranked GLORY featherweight Miguel Trindade (59-6, 24 KO) faces RISE great & former GLORY title contender Kento Haraguchi (26-4-1, 17 KO).

programme.desc: Mike Short comes from a history of street fighting and recognizes the importance of training and discipline. He has been coaching Boxing for many years and relishes the fact that his entire family comes together at his events, run out of Dekada Gym.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.desc: Chael Sonnen has trained with Team Quest, alongside fighters like Matt Lindland and Randy Couture. Tim Credeur has kept busy fighting on the US navy jiu-jitsu and judo teams, and making some cash in bullpen fights in Tijuana.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Bill Mahood has studied every martial art imaginable, and he'll need all that experience when he takes on Kalil Ibrahim, a karate ans kickboxing expert. Steve Steinbeiss fights Jeff Ford, an MMA champion and a personal trainer on VH1's Celebrity Fight Club.

programme.title: Paltan
programme.desc: The film showcases an untold story of the Indian forces fighting an intense battle to ward off Chinese infiltration. On Sep. 16, 1965, during the Indo-Pakistan war, China issued an ultimatum to India to vacate the Nathu La Pass, but Major-General Sagat Singh refused. The Chinese turned more aggressive, digging trenches in Nathu La on the Sikkim side of the Sikkim-Tibet border. The Indian army retaliated by building clear fences. All the scuffles led to a full-fledged battle that resulted in the Indian forces destroying many Chinese bunkers until they declared a ceasefire, but suffered great casualties as well.

programme.title: Gangaaa

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E55 Jodha Akbar S2 E55
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Behan Hogi Teri
programme.desc: In the city of Lucknow, Gattu, a jobless UPSC aspirant falls in love with Binny, a girl who lives in his neighbourhood but doesn't pay much attention to him because she finds him a coward. Gattu's desire to marry Binny puts him in a situation where he has to not just face off with a family of criminals who want to make Binny their daughter-in-law but also gather the courage to convince his parents and neighbours that all boys and girls living in the same neighbourhood are not brothers and sisters.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E206 Undercover Love S1 E206
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E206 Dholi Beats S1 E206
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E206 King of Hearts S1 E206
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E206 Second Chances S1 E206
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E60 Jodha Akbar S2 E60
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E206 This is Fate S1 E206
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Kto pragnie zemsty?
programme.desc: Dwóch rewolwerowców wjeżdża do miasta z planem odebrania dużej, acz niezasłużonej nagrody. Zostają wplątani w lokalną wojnę o ziemię związaną ze zbliżającą się budową kolei.

programme.title: Rzeź za Dziesięć Tysięcy Dolarów
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Django zostaje poproszony o schwytanie złoczyńcy, który porwał pewną młodą dziewczynę.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Durango, Płać Albo Giń
programme.desc: Windykator wplątuje się w niebezpieczną sytuację, gdy skorumpowany biznesmen, dla którego odzyskał 100 000 dolarów, nie chce mu zapłacić zwyczajowego procentu za jego usługi.

programme.title: Samuraj
programme.desc: Koniec XIX wieku. Cesarz Japonii wysyła w prezencie prezydentowi USA świętego kucyka. Ten jednak zostaje skradziony przez Indian, którzy żądają miliona dolarów okupu. Szeryf Blackjack Gideon oferuje dostarczenie okupu i odebranie kucyka.

programme.title: Zwą Mnie Alleluja
programme.desc: Generał Ramirez walczy o rewolucję w Meksyku przeciwko europejskiej dominacji. Wynajmuje Hallelujah, tajemniczego rewolwerowca, by zlikwidował europejskiego cesarza Maksymiliana, przejmując sakiewkę z klejnotami, która miała być przeznaczona na zakup broni.

programme.title: Ręce Do Góry Truposzu! Jesteś Aresztowany
programme.desc: Sando Kid (Peter Lee Lawrence), ocalały z rzezi urządzonej przez wojska północy, szuka zemsty. Działa w pojedynkę i uderza w każdą osobę zamieszaną w masakrę.

programme.title: Dwa Rewolwery i Tchórz
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen, młody rewolwerowiec, który pracuje jako cyrkowiec, jest świadkiem zabójstwa kilku banitów dokonanego przez ich przywódcę. Sam zostaje uznany za winnego tego czynu. Steffen cierpi na kompleks, który blokuje go przed jakąkolwiek przemocą i sprawia, że wydaje się tchórzliwy. Kiedy młody chłopiec zostaje porwany, musi znaleźć sposób, aby odzyskać spokój.

programme.title: Dwa Krzyże w Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy i Alex to rodzeństwo, które ocalało z masakry zleconej przez bezwzględnego Morana.

programme.title: Dwie Strony Dolara
programme.desc: Nauczyciel, rewolwerowiec, były pułkownik i piękna kobieta układają plan napadu na Fort Henderson. Kiedy im się to udaje, kłopoty dopiero się zaczynają.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django jest na tropie bandytów, którzy zgwałcili i zabili jego żonę.

programme.title: Udanego Pogrzebu, Przyjacielu... Sartana Zapłaci
programme.desc: Legendarny bohater Sartana jest świadkiem brutalnej masakry. Jest gotów przeprowadzić śledztwo. Prawie wszyscy w maleńkim miasteczku Indian Creek zdają się chętni do wykupienia posiadłości ofiar morderstwa...

programme.title: Django i Sartana na Zachodzie
programme.desc: Gang bezwzględnych banitów pod wodzą szalonego Czarnego Burta Kellera porywa Jessicę Colby i postanawia uciec do Meksyku. Sprytny łowca nagród Django i świątobliwy rewolwerowiec Sartana łączą siły, by uratować biedaczkę z nikczemnych szponów gangu.

programme.title: Generał
programme.desc: Kolorowa wersja filmu. Kiedy szpiedzy Unii kradną ukochaną lokomotywę inżyniera, ten samotnie ściga ją prosto przez linie wroga.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Anioł i złoczyńca
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, wszechstronny złoczyńca, wraca do zdrowia. Opiekuje się nim Penelope Worth, kwakierka. Quirt musi wybrać między swoim światem a światem, w którym żyje Penelope.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Miasteczko Abilene
programme.desc: Pierwszy raz w kolorze! Klasyczny amerykański western z 1946 roku z Randolphem Scottem w roli głównej: Miasteczko Abilene. Szeryf stara się zapobiec sporom między osadnikami na Dzikim Zachodzie po wojnie secesyjnej.

programme.title: Zabójca w Czerni
programme.desc: W Tombstone nowy szeryf przysięga oczyścić miasto z bandytów, takich jak bracia O'Hara, a pomaga mu w tym dziwaczny prawnik, który zawsze nosi przy sobie dwie duże księgi prawnicze.

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Dzień bezprawia
programme.desc: Ranczer Blaise Starrett i osadnicy są skłóceni, ale gdy brutalny gang Jacka Bruhna napada na ich miasteczko, muszą zjednoczyć siły. Tylko razem mają szansę na przetrwanie nocy i ocalenie swojej społeczności.

programme.title: Podróżnik z Missouri
programme.desc: Zbiegły sierota, Biarn Turner (De Wilde), próbuje uciec od kłopotów, podróżując na Florydę na początku XX wieku. Trafia do małego miasteczka, gdzie redaktor lokalnej gazety, Doyle Magee (Merrill), postanawia przygarnąć chłopca i dać mu szansę na normalne życie. Zamożny miejscowy farmer, Tobias Brown (Marvin), również interesuje się przyszłością Biarna, ale traktuje młodego człowieka surowo, maskując prawdziwe ukryte uczucia Tobiasa i szczerą troskę. Maniery Biarna i jego chęć niesienia pomocy innym szybko zjednują mu przychylność mieszkańców miasteczka, a on sam udowadnia swoją wartość, przygotowując pozornie niezdolnego do treningu konia do wyścigu, który miasto zorganizuje podczas...

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec od Stu Krzyży
programme.desc: Na Dzikim Zachodzie ginie pewien Irlandczyk. Jego syn Jimmy wyrusza na poszukiwanie zabójców ojca, ale wpada w zasadzkę i również zostaje zabity.

programme.title: Django... Adiós!
programme.desc: Django jest szeryfem, który zostaje niesłusznie aresztowany za kradzież skrzyni pełnej dolarów, przeznaczonych na budowę szkoły i kościoła w Silver City.

programme.title: Czterej Zabójcy Sartany
programme.desc: Siedmiu zamaskowanych bandytów porywa młodą Susy, kuzynkę burmistrza Clayton City, Franka Clonny'ego. Frank przyjmuje 15.000 dolarów okupu, którego żądają bandyci i obmyśla plan, który pozwoli mu odzyskać pieniądze i schwytać bandytów.

programme.title: Chcesz Żyć To Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Młody kowboj, Johnny, grając w sfałszowaną grę w pokera, zmuszony jest zastrzelić jednego z pozostałych graczy.

programme.title: Ostatni Zabójca
programme.desc: Rodzice Ramona zostają zabici przez ludzi właściciela ziemskiego Johna Barretta. Próbując się zemścić, Ramon zostaje ranny, ale udaje mu się uratować życie Rezzy, staremu, zdesperowanemu rewolwerowcowi.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Piąte - Nie Zabijaj
programme.desc: Po napadzie na bank grupa banitów zbiera się w opuszczonym saloonie. Okazuje się, że brakuje łupu, a bandyci zaczynają się wzajemnie obrażać.

programme.title: Dyliżans
programme.desc: Grupa podróżująca dyliżansem zbliża się do siebie z powodu zagrożenia ze strony Geronimo i przy okazji dowiaduje się więcej o sobie nawzajem.

programme.title: Zachód słońca nad Kolorado
programme.desc: Ranczer pomaga przyjacielowi odzyskać odziedziczone pole, ale zostaje oskarżony o jego morderstwo.

programme.title: Jeden po Drugim
programme.desc: Na granicy Teksasu i Meksyku, podczas wojny secesyjnej, pułkownik Greyson został oskarżony o zdefraudowanie 500 000 dolarów, które miał dostarczyć dowództwu Konfederacji.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Zimny Zabójca
programme.desc: José Desman zabija swojego pracodawcę, pana Salazara, byłego sędziego, który skazał jego ojca na śmierć.

programme.title: Wielebny Colt
programme.desc: Do Tucson przybywa wielebny Miller z planem budowy kościoła. W dniu jego przyjazdu zostaje obrabowany bank. Mieszkańcy Tucson, podejrzliwi wobec nowego wielebnego, bo ten nosi przy sobie broń, natychmiast obwiniają go o napad.

programme.title: Martwi ludzie
programme.desc: Na bezprawnym Starym Zachodzie, dwóch braci wyrusza w pełną niebezpieczeństw podróż. Ich celem jest pomszczenie śmierci ojca, ochrona plemienia Apaczów, które kochają, i odzyskanie należnych im ziem oraz złota. W trakcie wyprawy będą musieli zmierzyć się z licznymi zagrożeniami i trudnymi decyzjami, a ich więź braterska zostanie wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Na Imię Mi Mallory... M Znaczy Śmierć
programme.desc: Emerytowany pułkownik Harper pragnie udać się na emeryturę na swoje ranczo, ale nikczemny Bart Ambler również interesuje się tą posiadłością.

programme.title: Wybuchowy Joe
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Córka Belle Starr
programme.desc: Bob "Bitter Creek" Yauntis zabija Belle Starr i przejmuje gang. Nowy szeryf Tom Jackson zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o jej śmierć przez jej córkę Rose. Aby oczyścić swoje imię i zyskać jej zaufanie, rusza tropem gangu. Western o zemście, odkupieniu i walce o sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Sabata
programme.desc: Sabata i Mangosta to rabusie. Po napadzie na bank i w wyniku serii niefortunnych wydarzeń, nawiązują współpracę z pracownikiem tegoż banku, Peterem. Rabusie uciekają, ale na ich drodze staje szef Petera i wynajęci przez niego rewolwerowcy.

programme.title: Za Kilka Dolarów Mniej
programme.desc: Urzędnik bankowy i jego kuzyn, "generał", łączą siły, by wytropić meksykańskiego banitę.

programme.title: Admini
programme.desc: Dzień z życia dwóch adminów o imieniu Dan i Randy. Admini denerwują użytkowników systemu, dyskutując o polityce biura i oglądajcą goprowców w kawiarni.

programme.title: Pomocy! Mój Detektyw Jest Idiotą!
programme.desc: Beznadziejny detektyw z Nowego Orleanu Biff Basham zostaje wplątany w sprawę szantażu, szpiegostwa i morderstw.

programme.title: Surogatka
programme.desc: The Surrogate to współczesna opowieść o grupie przyjaciół po czterdziestce z Bay Area, którzy wspólnie przeżywają trudne chwile.

programme.title: Pomiędzy Światami
programme.desc: Opowieść o młodym pisarzu, który próbuje pogodzić się z dziewczyną i przetrwać zawiłości nocnego życia stolicy, korzystając jedynie z pomocy swoich imprezujących, dowcipkujących przyjaciół, którzy ciągną go od jednego londyńskiego nocnego lokalu do drugiego.

programme.title: Oracabessa
programme.desc: Podczas odkupieńczej podróży w celu odnalezienia zaginionego 6-letniego chłopca, pewna studentka krzyżuje ścieżki z bezwzględnymi handlarzami ludźmi.

programme.title: Przyjaciółki, Wroginie i Fajerwerki
programme.desc: Grupa przyjaciółek spotyka się na przyjęciu sylwestrowym. Wracają dawne napięcia i dawne rywalizacje. Noc pogrąża się w chaosie, a iskry i rewelacje lecą jak fajerwerki.
Programista komputerowy staje się coraz bardziej rozczarowany podczas pracy nad projektem mającym na celu replikację ludzkiej inteligencji przy użyciu mapy ludzkiego genomu.

programme.title: Admini
programme.desc: Dzień z życia dwóch adminów o imieniu Dan i Randy. Admini denerwują użytkowników systemu, dyskutując o polityce biura i oglądajcą goprowców w kawiarni.

programme.title: Specjalność zakładu
programme.desc: Samotny mężczyzna z trzeciego pokolenia właścicieli wielkiej sieci restauracji Tortilla Hut musi znaleźć nowe danie do menu. W wiejskiej restauracji w Nowym Meksyku poznaje uroczą, znakomitą szefową kuchni.

programme.title: Appleton
programme.desc: W wiejskim gospodarstwie rolnym Appleton w stanie Wisconsin nadeszła sroga zima, a do miasta, które kiedyś terroryzował, powróciła zbuntowana postać Mitchella. Maddy Ballister straciła ojca z rąk Mitchella, a teraz jest gotowa, aby go znaleźć i pomścić.

programme.title: Pod Słońce
programme.desc: Aspirujący młody pisarz (Jackson) śledzi tytana literatury (Keitel) cierpiącego na blokadę pisarską do jego schronienia na wsi we Włoszech i uczy się o życiu i miłości od niepokornego geniusza i jego córek.

programme.title: Check Point
programme.desc: Port City w Północnej Karolinie: Podczas rutynowego biwaku miejscowy włóczęga, który był dawnym żołnierzem piechoty morskiej, natrafia na plany inwazji na Amerykę

programme.title: Oczekiwanie
programme.desc: Zabójca mafii zgadza się przyjąć tożsamość swojej ostatniej ofiary, aby odkupić swoją przeszłość. Dwie partie szachów – jedna z ofiarą, druga z szefem – podkreślą punkty zwrotne tej zmiany.

programme.title: Nic mi nie jest
programme.desc: Jest to historia młodej dziewczyny, która musi pomóc swojej mamie Denise rozwieść się z byłym mężem Barrym, aby mogła poślubić swojego nowego ukochanego Jeffereya. Podczas weekendu z rodzicami na letnim obozie, Sam musi nakłonić ojca do podpisania dokumentów rozwodowych i nieświadomie zabiera ją na wycieczkę na konkurs muzyczny. Wszyscy myślą, że została porwana i jest wspólniczką napadu, więc mama i Law ruszają w pościg. Dramat prowadzi do tego, że rodzina staje się sobie bliższa niż kiedykolwiek wcześniej.

programme.title: Tajemnica Kansas City
programme.desc: Były skazaniec próbuje uczciwego życia, ale zostaje wrobiony w kradzież miliona dolarów. By oczyścić swoje imię, rusza do Meksyku, gdzie wpada na trop bandytów i skorumpowanego policjanta. Wciągający noir z dynamiczną akcją i tajemnicą do rozwiązania.

programme.title: Poznaj Hope
programme.desc: Historie miłosne dziadka pouczają mężczyznę i dziewczynę o realiach miłości.

programme.title: Morderstwo Nad Rzeką Wolf
programme.desc: Dwóch najlepszych przyjaciół szuka ucieczki ze świata pełnego niebezpieczeństw.

programme.title: Chłopak, Który Czytał Mapy
programme.desc: W małym nowozelandzkim miasteczku 16-letni Michael wiedzie samotną, introwertyczną egzystencję. Jego również samotna matka Amelia zmaga się z poczuciem winy i alkoholizmem. Nie rozumiejąc i nie akceptując życia swoich "przyjaciół", Michael znajduje ucieczkę w miłości do map.

programme.title: Hibiskus
programme.desc: Młody pracownik cmentarza musi w tajemnicy przez 3 dni opiekować się dziewczyną.

programme.title: Streamer
programme.desc: Odizolowany młody mężczyzna popada w obsesję na punkcie dziewczyny z kamerki internetowej, która mieszka w jego budynku. Zaprzyjaźnia się z nią, pomimo sprzecznych uczuć.

programme.title: Tajemniczy miliarder
programme.desc: Komedia romantyczna w wersji z polskim lektorem - Tajemniczy miliarder. Przezabawne perypetie przystojnego biznesmena, który pod przykrywką "bezdomnego miliardera" udaje się do Nowego Jorku.

programme.title: Wszystko o Ewie
programme.desc: Wszystko o Eve. Eva, rezolutna i powabna młoda dżokejka, przenika do stajni Pope'a Healy'ego, bogatego magnata wyścigowego.

programme.title: Witaj w klanie mężczyzn
programme.desc: Grupa samopomocy popada w chaos, gdy długotrwałe konflikty zaczynają zagrażać zaufaniu między mężczyznami.

programme.title: Samce Alfa
programme.desc: Komiczne spojrzenie na to, jak zachowania mężczyzn i kobiet bardzo mało ewoluowały od czasów jaskiniowców...

programme.title: Z Premedytacją
programme.desc: Czterech niezależnych filmowców zapuszcza się do małego wiejskiego miasteczka na festiwal filmowy i obiecujące spotkanie z dyrektorem filmowym. Zostają wtrąceni do więzienia za ohydną zbrodnię, a nikt nie pamięta wydarzeń z poprzedniej nocy.

programme.title: Sylwetki
programme.desc: Aamod jest emerytowanym dyrektorem wykonawczym i playboyem, który mieszka samotnie w swoim wielkim apartamencie w centrum Chicago; Nadia jest prawniczką, która jedzie właśnie zobaczyć swoich konserwatywnych muzułmańskich rodziców po raz pierwszy od ponad dekady.

programme.title: Bliźniacze Miasta
programme.desc: Kiedy programista komputerowy odkrywa, że jest śmiertelnie chory, musi ścigać się z czasem, aby uratować swoje małżeństwo i naprawić zmarnowane życie.

programme.title: Pracodawca
programme.desc: Pięciu wysoko wykwalifikowanych kandydatów odbywa rozmowę kwalifikacyjną o pożądaną pracę. W noc poprzedzającą ostatnią rundę rozmów kwalifikacyjnych, wszyscy zostają porwani i odurzeni narkotykami. Następnego dnia budzą się uwięzieni razem w zamkniętym pokoju bez nadziei na ucieczkę.

programme.title: Psychole
programme.desc: Trzy młode kobiety szukają zemsty na sadystycznym drapieżniku.

programme.title: Starzy Znajomi
programme.desc: Mężczyzna z nadwagą spotyka na szkolnej bieżni dawną koleżankę z klasy. Gdy oboje stają się sobie bliscy i inspirują się nawzajem, ich przeszłość wkrada się z powrotem do ich życia i zaczyna zagrażać wszystkiemu, co wypracowali.

programme.title: Pamiętniki Szekspira
programme.desc: Odkryto dawno zaginione dzienniki wielkiego Barda. Współczesna wersja.

programme.title: Obietnice
programme.desc: Dwójka dzieci traci ze sobą kontakt, gdy jedno z nich wyjeżdża do innego miasta. Po latach znów się połączą, nie zdając sobie z tego sprawy. Kiedy uświadomią sobie kim są, będą w stanie wyleczyć rany zadane przez przeszłość.

programme.title: Luna: Dusza Wieloryba
programme.desc: Mike Maquinna powraca do swojego rodzinnego miasta Gold River na wyspie Vancouver, aby wziąć udział w pogrzebie swojego ojca, Mowachaht/Muchalaht First Nations Chief Ambrose Maquinna.

programme.title: Ścigając Roberta Barkera
programme.desc: Fotograf- paparazzi zostaje wplątany w sfabrykowaną historię tabloidu, która ma na celu doprowadzenie do upadku znanego aktora.

programme.title: Zwyczajna Rodzina
programme.desc: Cztero osobową rodzinę dopada ich ukryte życie, izolacja od siebie nawzajem i przeszłość. Kulminacją jest jedyna rzecz, której unikali... konfrontacja. Rodzina rozpada się, gdy żona i matka ukrywa swój alkoholizm, a mąż próbuje ukryć swoje pożądanie do innej kobiety. Córka eksperymentuje z seksem, narkotykami i alkoholem, a syn tworzy sobie wyimaginowanego przyjaciela, który jest jego opiekunem.

programme.title: Dawn
programme.desc: Kobieta ucieka przed straszną prawdą i razem ze swoją córeczką ukrywa się w odległym miasteczku na wzgórzach. W końcu przychodzi moment gdy przeszłość ją dogania. Kobieta staje przed niemożliwym wyborem.

programme.title: Spal Swoje Imię
programme.desc: Zmagający się z problemami muzyk wprowadza się do swojego najlepszego przyjaciela geja, aby rozpocząć na nowo swoje życie, ale zakochuje się w ich współlokatorce lesbijce.

programme.title: Ostateczna sprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Kiedy członek rodziny jednego z nich zostaje zaatakowany, zespół byłych elitarnych żołnierzy zostaje wezwany do akcji. Rozpoczyna się bezwzględna gra, której zasady są proste: zabijaj i nie daj się zabić.

programme.title: Nazi Dawn
programme.desc: Siostry z braterstwa studenckiego jadą do letniego domku jednej z nich. Ten okazuje się być nawiedzony przez nazistowskiego mordercę.

programme.title: Krwawa Gra
programme.desc: Profesjonalny zawodnik sztuk walki Ryan McGowan (Vince Segovia) rozpoczyna współpracę z policją, by walczyć z rosnącą w mieście przestępczością i coraz to brutalniejszymi bandytami.

programme.title: The Drifter
programme.desc: He only wants to return home to his cabin in the woods, but the man known as 'The Drifter' finds himself involved with a murder! Director William A. O'Connor, whose career included everything from drug scare movies to the early films of John Wayne, gives us a dramatic and savage tale of family secrets. With excellent performances by William Farnum and Noah Beery, The Drifter is an early talkie that still pulsates with the angst and melodrama of the silent era...

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila O'Conner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Arizona Thunderbolt
programme.desc: When Sue Bixby becomes his new boss, stagecoach robber Talbot reforms and goes after her rustled cattle. When he and his men are outnumbered fighting Lloyd's gang, Randall rides to get circus man Mahoney and his man shooting cannon.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright gives a strip of fertile farming land to an Indian who had previously saved Bens life. Things take a deadly turn, however, when the land ends up being next to a very racist farmer.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe's date, Jennifer, is abducted and held for ransom at the circus. He and Hoss search the circus for her, facing a tough crowd of carnies in their search.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Gunnar, a long-lost relative of the Cartwright family, arrives in Ponderosa, where the family takes him in for the night. Unknown to the Cartwrights, however, is Gunnars leading of The Comancheros, a dangerous band of criminals. After Little Joe and his girlfriend are kidnapped by The Comancheros, the Cartwrights and Gunnar must work things out.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright unknowingly hires outlaw Johnny Logan to help him with his cattle drive. Logan, going by the name Sam Jackson, joined with a plan to kill the sheriff of a nearby town.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but he's not fond of Hooterville. programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction

programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Petticoat Junction

programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.
